scripts.build: npm run less && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run less && npx webpack --devtool source-map && webpack serve
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && rm dist/bundle.js && rm dist/bundle.js.map && rm dist/main.bundle.css && rm dist/main.bundle.css.map
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:dev
